decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy through counterspells, removal spells, and land destruction while using cards like Dress Down and Stifle to take advantage of Phyrexian Dreadnought's powerful ability. The deck also utilizes card draw effects like Brainstorm and Ponder to dig for key pieces and maintain card advantage. Additionally, the inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Nulldrifter provides card advantage and potential late-game value. The overall goal is to outmaneuver the opponent and secure a win through careful resource management and strategic play.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Ancient Tomb and Grim Monolith to play powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and Breaker of Creation. This deck utilizes cards like Cavern of Souls to protect its creatures from countermagic and disrupt opponents with cards like Wasteland. The goal is to overwhelm opponents with early aggression and powerful threats, utilizing the Eldrazi tribe synergy and high mana efficiency to dominate the battlefield.

The main focus of this Dark Depths combo deck is to tutor and assemble the combo pieces of Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck includes key cards like Knight of the Reliquary, Crop Rotation, and Green Sun's Zenith to efficiently search for and play out the combo pieces. The deck also includes disruption cards like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending to control the board while setting up the winning combo. Additionally, the deck features land destruction with Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive, proactive plays. By utilizing cost-reduction cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide, along with powerful creatures such as Magus of the Moon and Broadside Bombardiers, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Once Upon a Time and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker helps to maintain consistency and find key pieces needed to maintain the tempo advantage in the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing a mix of creature control and ramp to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. By combining cards like Endurance, Natural Order, and Gaea's Cradle, the player can efficiently build up their board presence and generate massive amounts of mana. The inclusion of key cards such as Once Upon a Time and Green Sun's Zenith allows for consistency in finding the necessary pieces to establish dominance on the battlefield. The strategy revolves around maximizing resources and utilizing The Rock archetype to outlast and outmaneuver opponents in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor combo, using it to mill cards from the library and eventually win the game by placing Thassa's Oracle on top of the deck to win the game. The deck includes ways to protect the combo with counter spells like Force of Will and disruption with Teferi, Time Raveler. It also includes cards like Dread Return and Narcomoeba to help with combo recursion and additional win conditions. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game before the opponent can disrupt it.
